verses.verse: And <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G1448>approached<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> and had <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G967>Bethphage,<s%> to the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G4198>"Go<s%> into the <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G2713>opposite<s%> you, and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> you will <S%G2147>find<s%> a <S%G3688>donkey<s%> <S%G1210>tied<s%> [there] and a <S%G4454>colt<s%> with her; <S%G3089>untie<s%> [them,] and <S%G71>bring<s%> [them] to Me.

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to you, you shall <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of them,' and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> he will <S%G649>send<s%> them."

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1096>took<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> that <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G3004>"Say<s%> to the <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G4622>Zion,<s%> <S%G2400>'Behold<s%> your <S%G935>King<s%> is <S%G2064>coming<s%> to you, <S%G4239>Gentle,<s%> and <S%G1910>mounted<s%> on a <S%G3688>donkey,<s%> <S%G2532>Even<s%> on a <S%G4454>colt,<s%> the <S%G5207>foal<s%> of a <S%G5268>beast<s%> of <S%G5268>burden.<s%>'"
And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4929>directed<s%> them,
and <S%G71>brought<s%> the <S%G3688>donkey<s%> and the <S%G4454>colt,<s%> and <S%G2007>laid<s%> on them their <S%G2440>garments,<s%> on <S%G846>which<s%> He <S%G1940>sat.<s%>

And <S%G4183>most<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4766>spread<s%> their <S%G2440>garments<s%> in the <S%G3598>road,<s%> and <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G2875>cutting<s%> <S%G2798>branches<s%> from the <S%G1186>trees,<s%> and <S%G4766>spreading<s%> them in the <S%G3598>road.<s%>

And the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4254>going<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> Him, and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G190>followed<s%> after were <S%G2896>crying<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5614>"Hosanna<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David;<s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G5614>Hosanna<s%> in the <S%G5310>highest!<s%>"
And when He had <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G4579>stirred,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%>?"
And the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> from <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G59>buying<s%> and <S%G4453>selling<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> and <S%G2690>overturned<s%> the <S%G5132>tables<s%> of the <S%G2855>moneychangers<s%> and the <S%G2515>seats<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G4453>selling<s%> <S%G4058>doves.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, " It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> 'My <S%G3624>house<s%> shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G4335>prayer<s%>'; but you are <S%G4160>making<s%> it a robbers' <S%G4693>den.<s%>"
And [the] <S%G5185>blind<s%> and [the] <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> and He <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.

But when the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G2297>wonderful<s%> <S%G2297>things<s%> that He had <S%G4160>done,<s%> and the <S%G3816>children<s%> who were <S%G2896>crying<s%> out in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5614>"Hosanna<s%> to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David,<s%>" they became <S%G23>indignant,<s%>

and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Do You <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> are <S%G3004>saying<s%>?" And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3483>"Yes;<s%> have you <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G314>read,<s%> 'Out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G3516>infants<s%> and <S%G2337>nursing<s%> <S%G2337>babes<s%> Thou hast <S%G2675>prepared<s%> <S%G136>praise<s%> for Thyself'?"
And He <S%G2641>left<s%> them and <S%G1831>went<s%> out of the <S%G4172>city<s%> to <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> and <S%G835>lodged<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> when He <S%G1877>returned<s%> to the <S%G4172>city,<s%> He became <S%G3983>hungry.<s%>

And <S%G3708>seeing<s%> a <S%G1520>lone<s%> <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> by the <S%G3598>road,<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> to it, and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> on it <S%G1508>except<s%> <S%G5444>leaves<s%> <S%G3440>only;<s%> and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to it, <S%G3756>"No<s%> <S%G3371><s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> shall there <S%G1519>ever<s%> <S%G165><s%> be [any] <S%G2590>fruit<s%> from you." And at <S%G3916>once<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3583>withered.<s%>

And <S%G3708>seeing<s%> [this,] the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2296>marveled,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4459>"How<s%> did the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3583>wither<s%> at <S%G3916>once<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and do not <S%G1252>doubt,<s%> you shall not <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> was done to the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree,<s%> but <S%G2579>even<s%> <S%G2579>if<s%> you <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> 'Be <S%G142>taken<s%> up and <S%G906>cast<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea,<s%>' it shall <S%G1096>happen.<s%>
"And <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> in <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> <S%G4100>believing,<s%> you shall <S%G2983>receive.<s%>"

And when He had <S%G2064>come<s%> into the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him as He was <S%G1321>teaching,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "By <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> are You <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> and <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> You <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "I will <S%G2065>ask<s%> you <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3056>thing<s%> <S%G2532>too,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G3004>tell<s%> Me, I will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> you by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

" The <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> was from <S%G4159>what<s%> [source,] from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> from <S%G444>men<s%>?" And they [began] <S%G1260>reasoning<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> we <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'From <S%G3772>heaven,<s%>' He will <S%G3004>say<s%> to us, <S%G3767>'Then<s%> <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not <S%G4100>believe<s%> him?'

"But <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'From <S%G444>men,<s%>' we <S%G5399>fear<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude;<s%> for they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>hold<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> to be a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>"

And <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> "We do not <S%G3609>know.<s%>" He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to them, <S%G3761>"Neither<s%> will I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you by <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

"But <S%G5101>what<s%> do you <S%G1380>think<s%>? A <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5043>sons,<s%> and he <S%G4334>came<s%> to the <S%G4413>first<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5043>'Son,<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G2038>work<s%> <S%G4594>today<s%> in the <S%G290>vineyard.<s%>'
"And he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I will, <S%G2962>sir<s%>'; and he did not <S%G565>go.<s%>

"And he <S%G4334>came<s%> to the <S%G1208>second<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>thing.<s%> But he <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> 'I <S%G2309>will<s%> not'; [yet] he <S%G5305>afterward<s%> <S%G3338>regretted<s%> [it] and <S%G565>went.<s%>

<S%G5101>"Which<s%> of the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of his <S%G3962>father<s%>?" They <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The <S%G5306>latter.<s%>" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you that the tax-gatherers and <S%G4204>harlots<s%> will <S%G4254>get<s%> into the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> you.

"For <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to you in the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> and you did not <S%G4100>believe<s%> him; but the tax-gatherers and <S%G4204>harlots<s%> did <S%G4100>believe<s%> him; and you, <S%G3708>seeing<s%> this, did not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G3338>feel<s%> <S%G3338>remorse<s%> <S%G5305>afterward<s%> so as to <S%G4100>believe<s%> him.

<S%G191>"Listen<s%> to <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3850>parable.<s%> There was a <S%G3617>landowner<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G5452>planted<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard<s%> and <S%G4060>put<s%> a <S%G5418>wall<s%> <S%G4060>around<s%> it and <S%G3736>dug<s%> a <S%G3025>wine<s%> <S%G3025>press<s%> in it, and <S%G3618>built<s%> a <S%G4444>tower,<s%> and <S%G1554>rented<s%> it out to vine-growers, and <S%G589>went<s%> on a <S%G589>journey.<s%>

"And <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G2590>harvest<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G1448>approached,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> his <S%G1401>slaves<s%> to the vine-growers to <S%G2983>receive<s%> his <S%G2590>produce.<s%>

"And the vine-growers <S%G2983>took<s%> his <S%G1401>slaves<s%> and <S%G1194>beat<s%> <S%G3739>one,<s%> and <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G3739>another,<s%> <S%G1161><s%> and <S%G3036>stoned<s%> a <S%G3739>third.<s%>

<S%G3825>"Again<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> group of <S%G1401>slaves<s%> <S%G4183>larger<s%> than the <S%G4413>first;<s%> and they <S%G4160>did<s%> the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>thing<s%> to them.
"But <S%G5305>afterward<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> his <S%G5207>son<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'They will <S%G1788>respect<s%> my <S%G5207>son.<s%>'

"But when the vine-growers <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G5207>son,<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3778>'This<s%> is the <S%G2818>heir;<s%> <S%G1205>come,<s%> let us <S%G615>kill<s%> him, and <S%G2192>seize<s%> his <S%G2817>inheritance.<s%>'
"And they <S%G2983>took<s%> him, and <S%G1544>threw<s%> him out of the <S%G290>vineyard,<s%> and <S%G615>killed<s%> him.
<S%G3767>"Therefore<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G2962>owner<s%> of the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> will he <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G1565>those<s%> vine-growers?"

They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "He will <S%G622>bring<s%> <S%G846>those<s%> <S%G2556>wretches<s%> to a <S%G2560>wretched<s%> <S%G622>end,<s%> and will <S%G1554>rent<s%> out the <S%G290>vineyard<s%> to <S%G243>other<s%> vine-growers, <S%G3748>who<s%> will <S%G591>pay<s%> him the <S%G2590>proceeds<s%> at the [proper] <S%G2540>seasons.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, " Did you <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> in the <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%> 'The <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G3618>builders<s%> <S%G593>rejected,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> the <S%G2776>chief<s%> <S%G1137>corner<s%> [stone;] <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> about from the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> And it is <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> in our <S%G3788>eyes<s%>'?

" <S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G3778><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> will be <S%G142>taken<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from you, and be <S%G1325>given<s%> to a <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G4160>producing<s%> the <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of it.

"And he who <S%G4098>falls<s%> on <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> will be <S%G4917>broken<s%> to <S%G4917>pieces;<s%> but on <S%G3739>whomever<s%> <S%G302><s%> it <S%G4098>falls,<s%> it will <S%G3039>scatter<s%> him <S%G3039>like<s%> <S%G3039>dust.<s%>"

And when the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> His <S%G3850>parables,<s%> they <S%G1097>understood<s%> that He was <S%G3004>speaking<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> them.
And when they <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G2902>seize<s%> Him, they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> they <S%G2192>held<s%> Him to be a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>
